item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

Lets welcome the new non-profit organization,"FIRST NIGHT BOSTON" to our BV Family. First Night, Inc. is a private nonprofit organization dedicated to building community and celebrating diversity through the arts from last 35 years. Learn more at

http://www.firstnight.org/aboutus/

I volunteered here last year and had a blast. Here are some pictures from last yr event taken in front of Boston Public library: Special lighting effects and ice sculpture.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are looking for 7 Volunteers for Day Shift Monday , Dec 31, 2012 for face painting, puppet captains and Procession Marshals.

Please make sure to RSVP here and fill the volunteer application at:

http://www.firstnight.org/volunteer/

First night Inc. engagement manager will contact you individually to assign you at a certain job/location. If you want to be in a group or with a friend, mention that in the volunteer application.

If you have any other question feel free to contact me @505-301-6872.

Thanks

Phani

The Boston Volunteers

Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

Please friend Boston Volunteers Mascot- Paulette: http://on.fb.me/Of9QbB

Connect with your fellow Boston Volunteers
http://www.facebook.com/BostonVolunteers
Discover exclusive Boston Volunteer opportunities:
https://twitter.com/#!/BostonVolunteer

P.S. Please check out new Boston Volunteers T-shirts.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Volunteer at 2013 First Night Boston-Face Painting/ puppet captains etc
